headline.print_headline: Chipmaker In the Netherlands Plans To Sell Shares
headline.main: Chipmaker in the Netherlands Plans to Sell Shares

docs.lead_paragraph: NXP Semiconductors, the Dutch chipmaker, filed to raise $1.15 billion in what would be the biggest initial public offering in the United States this year.
docs.snippet: NXP Semiconductors, the Dutch chipmaker, filed to raise $1.15 billion in what would be the biggest initial public offering in the United States this year....

headline.print_headline: Chip Maker Marvell Forecasts a Strong Third Quarter
headline.main: Chip Maker Marvell Forecasts a Strong Third Quarter

docs.lead_paragraph: The chip maker Marvell Technology Group forecast strong revenue growth in the third quarter, despite a tough hard-drive market, as it came out of an inventory overhang, sending its shares up 8 percent.
docs.snippet: The chip maker Marvell Technology Group forecast strong revenue growth in the third quarter, despite a tough hard-drive market, as it came out of an inventory overhang, sending its shares up 8 percent....

headline.print_headline: Palm Stock Falls After a Disappointing Forecast
headline.main: Palm Stock Falls After a Disappointing Forecast

docs.lead_paragraph: Shares of Palm Inc. fell the most in more than two years in Nasdaq trading after it forecast sales this quarter that were less than half of analysts’ estimates.
docs.snippet: Shares of Palm Inc. fell the most in more than two years in Nasdaq trading after it forecast sales this quarter that were less than half of analysts’ estimates....

docs.lead_paragraph: The National Semiconductor Corporation, a maker of chips that control power in electronic devices, forecast third-quarter sales lower than analysts’ estimates, citing weak demand from mobile phone makers.
docs.snippet: The National Semiconductor Corporation, a maker of chips that control power in electronic devices, forecast third-quarter sales lower than analysts’ estimates, citing weak demand from mobile phone makers....

headline.print_headline: Shares In Micron Rise After It Posts a Profit
headline.main: Shares in Micron Rise After It Posts a Profit

docs.lead_paragraph: Micron Technology, the computer chip maker, rose 7 percent Friday after it reported its first annual profit in four years.
docs.snippet: Micron Technology, the computer chip maker, rose 7 percent Friday after it reported its first annual profit in four years....

headline.print_headline: OmniVision Stock Climbs After It Posts a Profit
headline.main: Omnivision Stock Climbs After It Posts a Profit

docs.lead_paragraph: The maker of semiconductor image sensor devices posted a fourth-quarter profit as revenue rose 76 percent and forecast first-quarter revenue ahead of expectations.
docs.snippet: The maker of semiconductor image sensor devices posted a fourth-quarter profit as revenue rose 76 percent and forecast first-quarter revenue ahead of expectations....

headline.print_headline: RCN, An Internet Service Provider, Is Acquired
headline.main: RCN, an Internet Service Provider, Is Acquired

docs.lead_paragraph: The broadband service provider RCN said on Friday that it had agreed to be bought by the private equity firm Abry Partners for about $1.2 billion, including debt.
docs.snippet: The broadband service provider RCN said on Friday that it had agreed to be bought by the private equity firm Abry Partners for about $1.2 billion, including debt....

headline.print_headline: Court In France Restricts eBay’s Use of Misspellings
headline.main: Court in France Restricts Ebay’s Use of Misspellings

docs.lead_paragraph: EBay was ordered to pay about $316,500 to Louis Vuitton Malletier for legal costs and damages and stop using Internet search terms the luxury goods maker protested.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA

docs.snippet: EBay was ordered to pay about $316,500 to Louis Vuitton Malletier for legal costs and damages and stop using Internet search terms the luxury goods maker protested....

headline.print_headline: Oracle Acquires a Medical Software Maker
headline.main: Oracle Acquires a Medical Software Maker

docs.lead_paragraph: The Oracle Corporation has agreed to buy Phase Forward, which makes software used to manage clinical drug trials, for $685 million, the companies said Friday.
docs.snippet: The Oracle Corporation has agreed to buy Phase Forward, which makes software used to manage clinical drug trials, for $685 million, the companies said Friday....
